name: PACIFIC MACHINE: REDUX
description:
Hello! This is THE MACHINE speaking!

Welcome to the PACIFIC MACHINE!

Exchange your mental energy for platinum bars! Follow an intense dystopian narrative set by the original players by a live vote that took place in January - March 2018. It is an interface, not a game.

MAJOR FEATURES:

- Extremely simple controls!
- There are real people in here.
- More than 100 cosmetic items to unlock!
- A sense of impending doom with each step you take.
- 3 fun reaction based locks to test your skill!
- It is an interface, not a game.
- Determine the fate of characters in a globally influenced vote.
- Screenshake!
- Please think about your actions.

We hope you enjoy your experience.

THE MACHINE
